detail_desc: T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Shorts in sturdy jersey with a zip fly and buttons and high waist with pleats at the front. Side pockets and fake flap back pockets with a button.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Shorts in airy jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide legs.

Wide trousers woven in a striped viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with a small frill trim, pleats at the top and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and straight legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
Cap with an appliqué on the front and concealed elastication at the back.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long hoodie in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a viscose and cotton weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves. Buttons down the front, short sleeves and a smocked skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hairbands in a braided cotton weave with covered elastication at the back.
Flip flops with rubber straps (elastic around the heels in sizes 7 to 9 1/2) and fluted rubber soles with a print motif on top.
Hat in soft, rib-knit, warming wool with a turn-up at the hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and raw-edge hems.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Bell-shaped, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and buttons down the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Cap in cotton canvas with a print motif on the front, glittery peak and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a patterned, stretch weave with a deep V-neck and seam under the bust. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and a cut-out back with horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side and a softly draping skirt with a high slit at the front. Unlined.
T-shirt bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and slim legs.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured weave with frayed edges. Notch lapels, a button at the front, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
High-waisted cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed, velvety-smooth finish. Stand-up collar, drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.

Wedge-heel sandals with a decorative knot detail at the front, an elasticated strap around the heel and braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 9 cm.

Playsuit in a crinkled weave with small frill trims. Deep V-neck front and back with wide ties at the back. Seam under the bust and at the back of the waist. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and short, wide legs. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in crisp cotton poplin with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems.
Pyjamas in a soft velour and cotton blend with a frill trim around the neckline, gathered yoke at the front and ribbed hems. Press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and on the inside of the legs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Scarf in an airy weave made from recycled polyester with frayed, raw edges at the sides.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Microfibre nightslip with side panels in transparent mesh, triangular lace cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lace trims under the bust and at the hem.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sweatpants in a regular fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Swim shorts in a block-coloured stretch weave with lacing and elastication at the waist, a fly with a hook and loop fastening and side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, boxy jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a slightly wider neckline.
Fitted, rib-knit top in a slightly shorter style with wide shoulder straps.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with shoulder straps that cross at the back and fasten at the back of the waistband with press-studs. Elastication at the back, press-studs at the crotch and elastication with decorative gathers at the hems.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with raw edges and a raw-edge hem.
Playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and short legs.
Jacket in soft velour with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Top in soft, fine-knit cotton jersey with long sleeves and buttons on one shoulder. Knitted flounce around the yoke and a roll-edged trim around the neckline.
Control-top tights that shape the tummy and bum. 30 denier.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Baby Exclusive. Helmet hat in a woven wool blend with a brushed finish. Narrow ties and a soft jersey lining. The polyester content of the hat is recycled.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit lambswool with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a jacquard-knit cotton blend supplied in a transparent plastic Christmas tree bauble.
Reversible sun hat in soft, cotton jersey with one patterned side and one solid-colour side. Narrow ties underneath. Width of brim 7 cm.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
V-shaped bralette in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in an airy, fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell and wool blend with a turtle neck at the front and a V-shaped opening with wide ties at the back. Roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a wrapover top, short, wide sleeves and a seam with elastication at the back of the waist. Detachable tie belt, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Metal hair clips. Length 4 cm.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Ankle-length 5-pocket trousers in leather with a high waist, zip fly with a button, seams at the knees and gently flared legs.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with decorative, wrapover elastic on the top, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, short sleeves and a drawstring at the hem of the top layer. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Narrow tie in silk grosgrain. Width 7 cm.
Set of a top and dungarees in jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees with adjustable straps, a kangaroo pocket at the front and elastication at the back of the waist.
